00033 #include <stdlib.h>
00034 #include <string.h>

00041 /**********************/
00042 /* Static definitions */
00043 /**********************/
00044 
00045 static Text *activeToolText = NULL;
00046 static SuggList suggestions = {NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL};
00047 static char *documentation = NULL;
00048 //static int doc_lines = 0;
00049 
00050 static int txttl_cmp(const char *first, const char *second, int len)
00051 {
00052     int cmp, i;
00053     for (cmp=0, i=0; i<len; i++) {
00054         if ( (cmp= toupper(first[i])-toupper(second[i])) ) {
00055             break;
00056         }
00057     }
00058     return cmp;
00059 }
00060 
00061 static void txttl_free_suggest(void)
00062 {
00063     SuggItem *item, *prev;
00064     for (item = suggestions.last; item; item=prev) {
00065         prev = item->prev;
00066         MEM_freeN(item);
00067     }
00068     suggestions.first = suggestions.last = NULL;
00069     suggestions.firstmatch = suggestions.lastmatch = NULL;
00070     suggestions.selected = NULL;
00071     suggestions.top = 0;
00072 }
00073 
00074 static void txttl_free_docs(void)
00075 {
00076     if (documentation) {
00077         MEM_freeN(documentation);
00078         documentation = NULL;
00079     }
00080 }

00086 void free_texttools(void)
00087 {
00088     txttl_free_suggest();
00089     txttl_free_docs();
00090 }

00092 void texttool_text_set_active(Text *text)
00093 {
00094     if (activeToolText == text) return;
00095     texttool_text_clear();
00096     activeToolText = text;
00097 }
00098 
00099 void texttool_text_clear(void)
00100 {
00101     free_texttools();
00102     activeToolText = NULL;
00103 }
00104 
00105 short texttool_text_is_active(Text *text)
00106 {
00107     return activeToolText==text ? 1 : 0;
00108 }

00110 /***************************/
00111 /* Suggestion list methods */
00112 /***************************/
00113 
00114 void texttool_suggest_add(const char *name, char type)
00115 {
00116     SuggItem *newitem, *item;
00117     int len, cmp;
00118 
00119     newitem = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(SuggItem) + strlen(name) + 1, "SuggestionItem");
00120     if (!newitem) {
00121         printf("Failed to allocate memory for suggestion.\n");
00122         return;
00123     }
00124 
00125     newitem->name = (char *) (newitem + 1);
00126     len = strlen(name);
00127     strncpy(newitem->name, name, len);
00128     newitem->name[len] = '\0';
00129     newitem->type = type;
00130     newitem->prev = newitem->next = NULL;
00131 
00132     /* Perform simple linear search for ordered storage */
00133     if (!suggestions.first || !suggestions.last) {
00134         suggestions.first = suggestions.last = newitem;
00135     }
00136     else {
00137         cmp = -1;
00138         for (item=suggestions.last; item; item=item->prev) {
00139             cmp = txttl_cmp(name, item->name, len);
00140 
00141             /* Newitem comes after this item, insert here */
00142             if (cmp >= 0) {
00143                 newitem->prev = item;
00144                 if (item->next)
00145                     item->next->prev = newitem;
00146                 newitem->next = item->next;
00147                 item->next = newitem;
00148 
00149                 /* At last item, set last pointer here */
00150                 if (item == suggestions.last)
00151                     suggestions.last = newitem;
00152                 break;
00153             }
00154         }
00155         /* Reached beginning of list, insert before first */
00156         if (cmp < 0) {
00157             newitem->next = suggestions.first;
00158             suggestions.first->prev = newitem;
00159             suggestions.first = newitem;
00160         }
00161     }
00162     suggestions.firstmatch = suggestions.lastmatch = suggestions.selected = NULL;
00163     suggestions.top= 0;
00164 }
00165 
00166 void texttool_suggest_prefix(const char *prefix)
00167 {
00168     SuggItem *match, *first, *last;
00169     int cmp, len = strlen(prefix), top = 0;
00170 
00171     if (!suggestions.first) return;
00172     if (len==0) {
00173         suggestions.selected = suggestions.firstmatch = suggestions.first;
00174         suggestions.lastmatch = suggestions.last;
00175         return;
00176     }
00177     
00178     first = last = NULL;
00179     for (match=suggestions.first; match; match=match->next) {
00180         cmp = txttl_cmp(prefix, match->name, len);
00181         if (cmp==0) {
00182             if (!first) {
00183                 first = match;
00184                 suggestions.top = top;
00185             }
00186         }
00187         else if (cmp<0) {
00188             if (!last) {
00189                 last = match->prev;
00190                 break;
00191             }
00192         }
00193         top++;
00194     }
00195     if (first) {
00196         if (!last) last = suggestions.last;
00197         suggestions.firstmatch = first;
00198         suggestions.lastmatch = last;
00199         suggestions.selected = first;
00200     }
00201     else {
00202         suggestions.firstmatch = NULL;
00203         suggestions.lastmatch = NULL;
00204         suggestions.selected = NULL;
00205         suggestions.top = 0;
00206     }
00207 }
00208 
00209 void texttool_suggest_clear(void)
00210 {
00211     txttl_free_suggest();
00212 }

00216     return suggestions.firstmatch;

00220 {
00221     return suggestions.lastmatch;

00225 {
00226     suggestions.selected = sel;
00227 }

00229 SuggItem *texttool_suggest_selected(void)
00230 {
00231     return suggestions.selected;
00232 }
00233 
00234 int *texttool_suggest_top(void)
00235 {
00236     return &suggestions.top;
00237 }

00239 /*************************/
00240 /* Documentation methods */
00241 /*************************/
00242 
00243 void texttool_docs_show(const char *docs)
00244 {
00245     int len;
00246 
00247     if (!docs) return;
00248 
00249     len = strlen(docs);
00250 
00251     if (documentation) {
00252         MEM_freeN(documentation);
00253         documentation = NULL;
00254     }
00255 
00256     /* Ensure documentation ends with a '\n' */
00257     if (docs[len-1] != '\n') {
00258         documentation = MEM_mallocN(len+2, "Documentation");
00259         strncpy(documentation, docs, len);
00260         documentation[len++] = '\n';
00261     }
00262     else {
00263         documentation = MEM_mallocN(len+1, "Documentation");
00264         strncpy(documentation, docs, len);
00265     }
00266     documentation[len] = '\0';
00267 }
00268 
00269 char *texttool_docs_get(void)
00270 {
00271     return documentation;
00272 }
00273 
00274 void texttool_docs_clear(void)
00275 {
00276     txttl_free_docs();
00277 }
